com.petroldesigns.chatbot
Class PetrolBotConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.petroldesigns.chatbot.PetrolBotConfig

public class PetrolBotConfig
extends java.lang.Object

The PetrolBotConfig class is a singleton that loads and manages a bot configuration from an xml file specified on the command line (or in a default location)

Author:
atrank

Nested Class Summary
 class PetrolBotConfig.PetrolBotConfigParser
          The SAX parser for the bot configuration file
